## üéØ Common Use Cases

### "What needs to be done?"
‚Üí Read [Summary](IMPROVEMENT_PLAN_SUMMARY_2026_02_16.md) Executive Summary  
‚Üí Review [Implementation Checklist](IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST_2026_02_16.md) phases

### "What should I work on today?"
‚Üí Check [Implementation Checklist](IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST_2026_02_16.md)  
‚Üí Look at current phase tasks  
‚Üí Follow step-by-step instructions

### "How do I fix [specific issue]?"
‚Üí Search [Quick Reference](IMPROVEMENT_PLAN_QUICK_REFERENCE_2026_02_16.md) for fix patterns  
‚Üí Check [Comprehensive Plan](COMPREHENSIVE_IMPROVEMENT_PLAN_2026_02_16.md) Appendix B for best practices

### "What's the command for [action]?"
‚Üí Check [Quick Reference](IMPROVEMENT_PLAN_QUICK_REFERENCE_2026_02_16.md) "Quick Commands" section

### "What's our progress?"
‚Üí Check [Implementation Checklist](IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST_2026_02_16.md) "Progress Tracking"  
‚Üí Update task checkboxes as you complete work

### "What's the business case?"
‚Üí Read [Summary](IMPROVEMENT_PLAN_SUMMARY_2026_02_16.md) "Budget and ROI" section  
‚Üí Review [Comprehensive Plan](COMPREHENSIVE_IMPROVEMENT_PLAN_2026_02_16.md) "Resource Requirements"

### "Who should do what?"

5. [ ] Generate validation report

## üõ†Ô∏è Tools Quick Reference

### Validation
```bash
python .github/scripts/enhanced_workflow_validator.py
python .github/scripts/enhanced_workflow_validator.py --json report.json
python .github/scripts/enhanced_workflow_validator.py --html report.html
```

### Auto-Fix
```bash
python .github/scripts/auto_fix_workflows.py --dry-run
python .github/scripts/auto_fix_workflows.py --apply
```

### Optimization
```bash
python .github/scripts/add_caching.py --type pip --workflows .github/workflows/*.yml
python .github/scripts/optimize_checkouts.py --workflows .github/workflows/*.yml
```

## üìû Getting Help

### Questions about the plan?
1. Check this index for the right document
2. Search within the relevant document
3. Create issue with tag `github-actions`

### Questions about specific workflows?
1. Check [Comprehensive Plan](COMPREHENSIVE_IMPROVEMENT_PLAN_2026_02_16.md) workflow inventory
2. Review [Quick Reference](IMPROVEMENT_PLAN_QUICK_REFERENCE_2026_02_16.md) categories
3. Consult workflow-specific documentation

### Need to report progress?
1. Update [Implementation Checklist](IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST_2026_02_16.md)
2. Mark tasks complete with [x]
3. Update progress percentages
4. Commit changes to track history
